title: Joe Root expects 'discussion' on pay cuts as coronavirus uncertainty rules
description: England's Test captain prepared for possibility summer could be drastically hit
content:
Suspension provides an opportunity to improve - Joe Root
Joe Root, England's Test captain, has admitted that he is prepared for the possibility that there is no cricket played at all during the 2020 summer, with the UK currently under lockdown as it battles … [+6385 chars]
